entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,989Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 46

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.

entry.title: How Do You Feel? (Chin Up Kid)
entry.summary:
Author: RoseByAnyOtherName17

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,661Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 91

Summary: “Derek,” Stiles said, heartbeat ratcheting up in surprise. “You…oh my God, what – are you – Jesus, come here dude!” And really, what else was Derek supposed to do except wrap his free arm around Stiles’ back when he lurched straight into Derek’s body and bury his face in Stiles’ hair? The embrace lasted two, three seconds. Then Elijah gurgled softly, a surefire sign that he was about to wake up and start wailing. “Holy shit,” Stiles whispered, pulling back and staring at the baby in Derek’s arms. “What the – what?” “Hi,” Derek said breathlessly. “Hi,” Stiles answered, still watching Elijah open his eyes and screw up his face in preparation to give voice to his fury. “You have a baby.” “Please help,” Derek said desperately. When Elijah started crying, albeit a little quieter than normal, Derek almost joined in. -- In which Derek Hale receives a baby from a one-night stand, panics, and goes to Stiles for help...four years after seeing him last. Some things never change.

entry.title: Derek's Person
entry.summary:
Author: ash_mcj

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,197Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 2,879

Summary: Derek didn’t like people—they set him on edge in a way that nobody quite seemed to understand, much to his vexation. They always invited themselves into his space, like they somehow had a right to be there. They touched his clothes, his books, his skin—leaving their scents clinging to things that were supposed to smell like himself. They expected him to talk to them, and never managed to wrap their heads around the notion that he just couldn’t. Words were difficult for him to use most of the time, and despite all efforts to communicate in other ways, people just didn’t understand. But it didn’t matter anyway, because Derek didn’t like people and had no inclination to socialize with them.But Stiles was…different, somehow. He did everything that Derek hated, and more. He intruded into Derek’s space, he rambled constantly, loudly, with flailing arms and fidgeting fingers—and his presence should have driven Derek up the wall, but it didn’t. Stiles didn’t set him on edge, like everyone else did. And maybe most surprising of all, he understood him.[or: reclusive, feral-risk derek hale finds solace in a wild child, much to his pack’s surprise](previously titled "Stiles Stilinski")

entry.title: True Fate
entry.summary:
Author: Lalaith_Quetzalli

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,368Chapters: 2/4Kudos: 31

Summary: Alan Deaton is a man who’s always known what he wanted: power. He understood from a very young age that it’s those with power that make the rules (or break them without consequence). He even knew exactly how to get that power. That hasn’t stopped him from failing in his plans. Each and every time. It’s almost like the harder he tries, the harder he fails… But he will find a way to succeed, he will, and no Stilinskis will get in the way this time!

entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,746Chapters: 1/11Kudos: 14

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything, until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. Then one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 630

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded. “What?” “The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still. When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.” “That’s impossible,” Derek whispered. “Not really, it comes around every seven days.” “This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: LIKE A WOLF HOWLING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,310Chapters: 7/37Kudos: 1

Summary: Twelve years after Adda's rampage, a now adult Eli Hale, along with Boyd and Erica's twin daughters, is working as a supernatural contractor; traveling the US and helping people out with problems of an occult nature. When the spirits of The Grey become frightened, and a powerful hunter targets the three, Eli must return home to Beacon Hills and gather the Hale Pack to once more defend their home. A mysterious and powerful hunter, a solo artist, travels the nation in an effort to destroy the supernatural threat to humanity. When she rescues an orphaned werewolf child, the delicate threads holding her paradigm together begin to unravel. Who is this child, really? Why is she so convinced that something bigger is at play here? And why, when she follows a target to Beacon Hills, do the streets seem so familiar? Or; The Parking lot is mostly empty. The neon sign which reads VACANCIES is buzzing, loud. In the car, Amanda and Ali say something back and forth, then look at you, and then speak again. You think that they resent you for dragging them out here, yet they won't leave.

entry.title: (If) This Is Killing Me
entry.summary:
Author: k_beta_cygni

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,210Chapters: 19/22Kudos: 83

Summary: FROM THE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF ANOMALY INVESTIGATION EXPEDITION 13, led by USDAI psychologist Lydia Martin and consisting of cellular biologist Mieczysław “Stiles” Stilinski, EMT Scott McCall, ex-Marine Jackson Whittemore, and physicist Kira Yukimura, has entered “The Preserve,” previously known as Cedar Hearth National Park on the pacific coast of the United States. The national park had been evacuated after being overtaken by an anomalous and inhuman force. They are in search of answers for what happened to EXPEDITION 12, a team of Green Berets led by Stilinski’s husband Derek Hale. Hale had returned unexpectedly, showing up in their house with no memory of how he left The Preserve. His subordinates Isaac Lahey, Vernon Boyd, and Erica Reyes have been declared missing by the USDAI. [FILES UPDATED IN NOVEMBER 2025]

entry.title: I Wanna Be Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Taintedtricked

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 503Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 15

Summary: Stiles never meant to fall for Derek Hale — the brooding, half-feral werewolf who grunts more than he talks and looks at him like he’s both a headache and a heartbeat. But somewhere between burnt coffee, pack crises, and late nights spent patching each other up, Stiles realizes he doesn’t just want to be in Derek’s orbit — he wants to be his. Derek’s spent his life building walls so no one can get close enough to hurt him again. But Stiles is persistent, sunlight in human form, and Derek’s starting to wonder if maybe it’s okay to want warmth. Secrets held too long begin to unravel, and somewhere between the noise and the silence, they find it — the quiet truth neither of them can ignore. “Maybe I just wanna be yours.” A slow-burn Sterek story inspired by I Wanna Be Yours by Arctic Monkeys — all coffee, comfort, and confessions you never meant to say out loud.

entry.title: A Very Merry Newtmas
entry.summary:
Author: Ruggy_21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,282Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 8

Summary: “No Newt. We are not going to let anything happen to you again. This time we’ll be able to save you. And besides, life is kind of boring when you aren’t on some crazy, dangerous adventure every day.”Newt and Minho look at Thomas. He smiles.“Up to one last adventure?” Or, Remember that page? The one between page 249 and page 251? What if I told you that the events from that page didn’t play out exactly how you thought they did… Or, while the survivors try to rebuild the world that WICKED broke, they receive a surprise visit from an old friend. A Christmastime adventure ensues.
